data.prayer: Father, we ask for 1 new simple churches in the state of Laborie, Saint Lucia. Place a simple church in every community of the 6,800 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Laborie, Saint Lucia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Laborie, Saint Lucia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Laborie, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Laborie, Saint Lucia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Laborie, Saint Lucia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Laborie, Saint Lucia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Laborie that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Laborie, Saint Lucia has a population of 6,800.

We estimate Laborie has 1,241 people who might know Jesus, 5,212 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 347 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.
